abstract: Mexican authorities raise death toll to 27 in town where truck lost control and slammed into religious procession.
lead_paragraph: The authorities on Thursday raised the death toll to 23 in a central Mexican town where a truck lost control and slammed into a religious procession.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Mexico: Runaway Truck Kills Pilgrims

snippet: The authorities on Thursday raised the death toll to 23 in a central Mexican town where a truck lost control and slammed into a religious procession.
